hermit:Spyglass.NAME: Spyglass

hermit:RedScarf.NAME: Red Scarf
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, discard up to #b7 cards from your draw pile.

hermit:DentedPlate.NAME: Dented Plate
hermit:DentedPlate.FLAVOR: Several bullets are still lodged inside.

hermit:PetGhost.NAME: Pet Ghost
DESCRIPTIONS: If you would die, survive with #b1 HP instead. You die at the end of your next turn. You cannot die before then.

hermit:CharredGlove.NAME: Charred Glove
hermit:CharredGlove.FLAVOR: Parts of the glove still glow with otherworldly cinders.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yCurse, your next attack deals #b4 more damage.

hermit:ClaspedLocket.NAME: Clasped Locket
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yOld #yLocket. Upon pickup, add #b3 #yMementos to your deck.
